title: Chocolate and hazelnut cake (Torta gianduia)
description: We made this as a birthday cake for Italy, which celebrated the 150th anniversary of its unification in 2011. Gianduia is a speciality of the Piedmont region and it’s a mixture of ground hazelnuts and chocolate.
ingredients: 200g/7oz butter, cubed, plus extra for greasing
3 tbsp hazelnut liqueur or amaretto liqueur (or fresh orange juice)
